version_description:
Version 3.4:
- Support for 3D Touch Quick Actions on iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
- Minor Bugfixes
Version 3.3:
- Many new features available behind the "More ..." button in the lower right corner:
- FRITZ!Box Answering Machines can be switched on and off
- Call Diversions can be enabled / disabled (requires at least FRITZ!OS 6.36)
- Wifi and Guest Wifi can be turned on / off
- Computers connected to your FRITZ!Box can be started via Wake-on-LAN
- Direct call back from the list with longpress on an entry or using "Call" in the detail view
- Supporting FRITZ!Box Call Through to enable calls from iPhone via your FRITZ!Box
- Swipe-to-right gesture to mark messages as read (see also new settings options)
- Voicebox messages can be shared with other apps
- Swipe-to-left gesture to delete fax messages
- Showing your iPhone contact pictures
- Fax messages can be suppressed in the "Calls" view if required (see settings).

- Click to Dial: In addition to Callthrough the FRITZ!Box Click to Dial feature is now also supported.
- Blocked Calls: Swipe left on the call list to add a phone number to the FRITZ!Box list of blocked calls.
- Callthrough: Transmission of your phone number can now be enabled or disabled.
- FTPS Port: In addition to the HTTPS port it's now also possible to specifiy the FRITZ!Box FTPS port.

Bugfixes:
- Showing Fax messages now again also works with iOS 11
- Call Through again works from the call list directly

- Layout adapted for iPhone X
- Voice Over (Accessibility) enhancements
- Minor Bugfixes
Communication with FRITZ!Box completely changed to HTTPS to overcome issues with newest FRITZ!OS version. FTPS connection no longer required to download answering machine and fax messages.
Minor Bugfixes, e.g. fax messages already deleted on the FRITZ!Box lead to an error messages which is now fixed.
CheckMy!Box now also supports iOS Dark Mode
Bugfix: Quick actions didn't work as expected on some devices with haptic touch (e.g. iPhone 11 Pro).

Bugfixes:
- Improved VoiceOver support for Call Through and Click to Dial
- Better readability of settings help texts in dark mode
Fix: "Delete Call List" now also supported for FRITZ!OS 7.20 (and later)
